name: Rocket Golf [beta]
description:
Rocket Golf is an ability powered golf adventure game where you can collect different power ups to add unique abilities to your RocketBall. 

CURRENT FEATURES

  • 2 fully playable course
  • 1 "secret" test hole
  • 6 Power-Ups

PLANED FEATURES

  • 3+ fully playable courses
  • Screen shot ScoreCards

POSSIBLE FEATURES

  • Un-lockable Balls
  • Course Best scores
  • More Courses
  • More Obstacles
  • More Power-Ups
  • Replay camera
  • Course Editor
  • Hot Seat Multiplayer
  • Online Multiplayer
  • Local Multiplayer
  • Achievements

=====================================

CONTROLS

[W,A,S,D + Arrow Keys]   ( Rotate ball )

[Hold Right Mouse]     ( Rotate Camera )

[Scroll Wheel]     ( Camera Zoom )

[Hold Space Bar] to (Charge Power) release to (Shoot)

[Press Space Bar] to use (Power-Ups) 

[ P ]     (ScoreCard / Pause)

======================================

       [ COME JOIN US IN OUR DISCORD ]

  • OFFICIAL ROCKET GOLF DISCORD

======================================

WAYS TO HELP SUPPORT DEVELOPMENT

We need your help to make this game the best it can be, everyone that donates during the BETA will receive a STEAM KEY (if we can gain enough support to release on steam), as well as a BETA TESTER role in our discord. The final release will be a standalone version with an increased price and the web version will remain as a free playable demo. 

Other ways you can help is to just play the game, come join the discord and let us know what you think, tell a friend who might like the game, share a link, or just leave some feedback. Every little bit helps and is greatly appreciated, we thank you.

======================================
